text: @GovMurphy The immensely sad irony is that those soldiers, sailors, and airmen died to preserve the freedom that @GovMurphy has so callously cast aside. Restore the freedom that these men and women cherished and laid down their lives for. #endthelockdown #EndTheShutdown #COVID19
